info.title: MAIL SMTP
info.description: Allowing RTILA users to send emails

post.description: Send Email with gmail smtp or your custom smtp

parameters.name: host
parameters.description: The hostname of the SMTP server that will be used to send emails. Leave empty to use Gmail's SMTP server, 'smtp.gmail.com'

parameters.name: port
parameters.description: The port number for the SMTP server. Leave empty to use default 587 for TLS

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: The email address of the account used to send emails

parameters.name: password
parameters.description: The password for the email account NB: For Gmail your have to create an App password from your gmail account

parameters.name: content
parameters.description: The email content, plain text or HTML
